status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: AsynchronousLogShipper.workToDo() calls notify() without synchronization, which is not allowed.

I understood I had overlooked this when I saw the bug. I will produce a fix soon.
Thank you.

The attached patch fixes the issue pointed out. I ran the repro attached and found that it passed.
